DOC.brief_title: Measles , Mumps , Rubella ( MMR ) Immunity College Students
DOC.criteria: Ability willing provide inform consent Documented receipt MMRII vaccination childhood Not pregnant Exclusion Criteria No history HIV infection . Immunocompromised health status due HIV infection , cancer , diabetes , liver , lung kidney disease , autoimmune disease , history splenectomy . Use immunosuppressive medication within last 2 3 month ( oral parenteral corticosteroid cytotoxic medication ) Medical condition require use immunosuppressive medication Received blood blood product within last 30 day Any vaccine receive last 30 day
